maxLiquidityPerTick().details: This parameter is enforced per tick to prevent liquidity from overflowing a uint128 at any point, and also prevents out-of-range liquidity from being used to prevent adding in-range liquidity to a pool

returns._0: The max amount of liquidity per tick

factory().notice: The Algebra factory contract, which must adhere to the IAlgebraFactory interface

maxLiquidityPerTick().notice: The maximum amount of position liquidity that can use any tick in the range

token0().notice: The first of the two tokens of the pool, sorted by address

token1().notice: The second of the two tokens of the pool, sorted by address
